name: Reader Rabbit: 2nd Grade
overview: Ambushed by pirates, Reader Rabbit and Sam the Lion must race to the top of Mt. Cheesemore to recover the Dreamship before the Pirates do! Can you help them? Features: Educational mini-games designed to teach basic Language Arts, Science, Problem Solving, and Math as well as Creative Exploration and Expression. Multiple difficulty levels for each mini-game that can be changed at any time. Full video cutscenes and voice acting throughout the game. Simple controls using the Wii Remote.
